title: Join our webinar for livestock and grassland farmers
categories: Payments to improve animal health and welfare

content.text: On Monday 20 November, we will host a webinar for livestock and grassland farmers to learn more about the funding opportunities available in England.
The webinar will focus on the Sustainable Farming Incentive (SFI) and the Animal Health and Welfare Pathway in particular.
Colleagues from the Rural Payments Agency (RPA) will join us and there will be time for questions.
Please register to attend the webinar on Monday 20 November at 4pm.
The 1-hour session will be recorded so if you can’t make it, don’t worry. We’ll share a link to the video recording in this post so you can watch it back when it suits you.

These webinars for farmers are still quite new and we’d appreciate your feedback. We’ll share an entry and exit survey with those who attend. It would be useful to know whether you found the webinar helpful, if you’d like us to plan more and how you think they could be improved.
